name: Dwarf Attack
description:
What is Dwarf Attack?

A miner is searching desperately for gold, while encountering a selfish dwarf, who claims all the gold in the mine as his. He starts throwing tools at the miner and the chaos begins!

Playstyle

"Dwarf Attack" is a retro, arcade, mini-game in 2D pixel graphic, which mainly focuses on action based level design and a touch of nostalgia with the retro mechanics. The goal is to claim the pot of gold, which is guarded by the dwarf. Some obstacles await you on your way to the gold, such as moving minecarts, falling stalactites and pickaxes. However the power-up's can assist you, which can provide you with a few seconds of super speed or mega jumps!

Controls
